** Shares of British industrial software provider AVV.L up 2% at 3,578p; among top pct gainers on FTSE 100 .FTSE index

** Co posts 20.5% rise in H1 profit, lifted by rev gains at OSIsoft and global economic recovery (Full Story)

** AVV says it sees continued growth in H2

** Integration with OSIsoft has progressed well, with both cost and rev synergies starting to materialise as planned - CEO

** Says also benefited from improving market conditions

** Including session's gains, AVV up 12.6% vs FTSE's 12.8% rise YTD


(Reporting by Muhammed Husain)

(( muhammed.husain@thomsonreuters.com ))
